summary: A young woman discovers that the pesticide being sprayed on vineyards is turning people into killer zombies.
cast: Marie-Georges Pascal|Félix Marten|Serge Marquand|Mirella Rancelot|Patrice Valota|Patricia Cartier|Michel Herval|Paul Bisciglia|Brigitte Lahaie|Olivier Rollin|François Pascal|Evelyne Thomas|Jean-Pierre Bouyxou|Guillaume Le Vacher|Raphaël Marongiu|Jean Rollin
title: Las uvas de la muerte
